description:
In the new Picdun, take on 60 dungeon levels with a young lady as your partner--an Archer, Whipper or Spellcaster. Cover all tiles on a floor to reveal the hidden picture.

Battle dynamic, powerful enemies!

You're cursed and can't attack, so protect your partner with a shield and guide her attacks.

Uncover the mystery of the Witch's Curse!
name: Picdun 2: Witch's Curse
